endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of ongoing and completed construction projects.
Create a new construction project with specified details and parameters.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific project by its identifier.
Update details and parameters of an existing project.
Remove a project and all its associated data from the system.
Add milestones to a specific project for progress tracking.
Retrieve the current progress and status of a specific project in real-time.
Retrieve a list of resources available for allocation to projects.
Assign a specific resource to a project or task with detailed allocation.
Generate and retrieve detailed reports on project statuses and metrics.
